articles.content: BAIKONUR /Kazakhstan/, March 15. /TASS/. The Soyuz MS-12 spacecraft carrying three new crew members to the International Space Station (ISS), docked with Russias Rassvet module on Friday, Russias spa… [+1424 chars]
